scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend" "npm run dev-admin"
scripts.build-unified: npm run build-all && npm run copy-builds
scripts.copy-builds: mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && mkdir -p backend/public/admin && cp -r admin/dist/* backend/public/admin/
scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-admin
scripts.build-all: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules admin/node_modules backend/public
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm install && node server.js
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:unified: npm run install-all && npm run build-unified
